fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Scare someone to force their defense level to stay at None for the night.
- Guard someone to roleblock their non-X visitors through immunity.
- Attack someone at night.
- Crank yourself to provide 1 use to each of your other abilities.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Other than Crank, your abilities are 1-use.
- Your defense cannot be anything other than None while using Crank.
- You can only use your attack ability starting from Night 5, though you can still gain charges for it before that.
